tasks.content: Share something that made you happy recently
Describe your relationship in 3 words
Mimic your partner's gesture or expression
Say your first impression when you met your partner
Share the silliest thing you've done lately
Describe your partner as an animal and explain why
Give your partner a silly/cute nickname and say it out loud
Tell your partner a cheesy pickup line
Share a small habit you changed for your partner
Rate your partner's outfit (1–10) and give a comment
Reveal a secret about your partner that only you know
Say a challenge you'd like to try together
Act out your partner's first move after waking up
Share a childhood memory you'd love to share with your partner
Share a moment when you felt proud of your partner
Mimic your partner's texting style
Pretend it's your first meeting — greet each other again
Pick an anime/cartoon character that suits your partner best
Say an inside joke only you two share
Tell your partner something that will make them laugh out loud
Strike your partner's proudest pose
Share a trip you'd love to take together
Reveal a tiny detail about your partner that makes your heart race
Take turns giving each other a compliment
Give your partner a 5-second hug
Gently pinch your partner's nose or cheek
Hold their face and gaze deeply for 5 seconds
Share a couple's secret only between you two
Place a gentle kiss on your partner's forehead
Hold your partner's hand and say something warm
Whisper something in your partner's ear
Wrap your arms around your partner's waist for 5 seconds
Place your hand in your partner's palm for 5 seconds
Close your eyes and let your partner touch your face
Turn your back and let your partner hug you from behind
Cup your partner's hands with yours
Nudge your partner's cheek with your nose
Gently draw a heart on your partner's hand
Playfully pinch your partner's ear
Write a word in your partner's palm and let your partner guess it
Whisper the words you most want to say in your partner's ear
Hold your partner's hand and give it a gentle shake twice
Place a gentle kiss on your partner's neck or hand
Share the little detail you adore most about your partner's body
Brush back a strand of your partner's hair and hold your partner's gaze for a few seconds
Tug lightly at their collar, revealing just a hint of skin
Rest your hand softly on your partner's thigh and feel the slight tremble beneath
Trace your lips around your partner's ear with a playful tease
Give a gentle squeeze to your partner's softest spot, whispering how it feels to you
Let your partner rest across your back, breathing in sync together
Call your partner's name in the voice you find most intimate
Glide your fingers slowly from your partner's chest down to their stomach, feel the warm of skin
Kiss the tender space just behind your partner's ear
Whisper the desire you've been holding in your partner's ear
Let your fingertips travel gently down your partner's spine
Brush your lips across your partner's eyelashes like a secret kiss
Rest your ear on your partner's chest and listen to the heartbeat for five seconds
Cover your eyes with your partner's hand, then find your partner's face with your lips
Leave a playful bite on your partner's neck, sealing it with a kiss
Invite your partner to sit on your lap for a moment, and whisper something sweetly daring
Slip your fingers into your partner's hair and softly play with it
Leave a tender nip along the edge of your partner's jaw
Rub your nose against your partner's neck in a soft, playful nuzzle
Place a lingering kiss on your partner's chest, holding there for a moment
Share a deep kiss for ten seconds, slow and steady
Gently undo your partner's buttons, revealing more skin, feeling the warmth
Tease along the edge of your partner's clothing with your fingertips
Press your partner softly against the sofa or wall, kissing until they whisper stop
Trace the outline of your partner's waist with the tip of your tongue
Slowly undo the clasp of their clothing with your fingertips
Loosen your partner's belt or ribbon without going further—just to build suspense
Take your partner's finger into your mouth, drawing it in slowly before letting go
Open (or pretend to open) a package of something playful, reading its instructions aloud
Recreate one of your fantasies together, acting out the scene as partners
Play out a "strangers meeting" scenario—from the first glance to a passionate kiss
Hold your partner down gently on the bed, keeping your partner's hands in place
Start with kisses at your partner's ankle, working slowly upward to the inside of the knee
Pass a piece of candy from your mouth to theirs
Leave a soft kiss mark on your partner's neck

eggEvents.name: Lucky Dice
eggEvents.description: Roll the dice again right now

eggEvents.name: Nose Only
eggEvents.description: No hands allowed — roll the dice with your nose!
